mapper.update: update unit set counit = #{counit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unitphone = #{unitphone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resmoney = #{resmoney,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bigbed = #{bigbed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, twobed = #{twobed,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, counit, unitphone, resmoney, bigbed, twobed from unit
